articles.title: R Kelly is placed on suicide watch after being given new trial date for his federal case in Chicago - Daily Mail
articles.description: A federal judge on Wednesday ordered R Kelly to stand trial in Chicago on child pornography and other charges next year after  he was placed on suicide watch in Brooklyn.
